channel.title: switching fabrics on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in switching fabrics on Notes

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210415
item.description: Network layer cont. # Switching fabrics # Since data can flow bidirectionally, inputs can become outputs, and vice versa. Output ports # Input port queueing # IP: Internet Protocol # ICMP = internet control message protocol Datagram format # The header is 20 bytes long. Upper layer can be TCP or UDP, or ICMP A type could be multimedia, satellite signal etc, used for priority.
